cards: Drink if you've ever fallen for someone in this room.
Everyone who's sent a risky text tonight drinks.
The person with the longest hair drinks twice.
Drink if you've ever cried watching a commercial.
Anyone who's broken their phone screen drinks.
Drink if you've ever pretended to laugh at a bad joke.
The last person to arrive drinks.
Drink if you've checked your phone in the last 5 minutes.
Everyone wearing black takes a sip.
Drink if you've ever walked into a glass door.
The tallest person picks someone to drink.
Drink if you've sung in the shower today.
Everyone who's ordered food delivery this week drinks.
Drink if you've ever forgotten someone's name mid-conversation.
The youngest person drinks and picks a partner.
Drink if you've stalked an ex online this month.
Everyone who can't whistle drinks twice.
Drink if you've ever fallen asleep in public.
The person with the most tattoos picks who drinks.
Drink if you've ever liked someone's photo by accident.
